title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 345: Featuring Bayne Pettinger + Terry Ryan
description:
On Episode 345 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Bayne Pettinger and Terry Ryan. Bayne joined (43:05) to discuss the recent news about Luke Prokop coming out, being an NHL agent, his time with Hockey Canada and tons more. But first, the guys open the show talking about the Seattle Expansion Draft. The guys then talk tons of NHL news, including the Seth Jones trade to Chicago, all of Philly’s moves, the NHL draft and more. Biz then sits down with Terry Ryan (02:29:23) to tell some funny draft stories and to check in with one of our favorite guests. The guys wrap up talking the weather and RA rants about Jeff Bezos.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
